---
layout: post
title: "OUTTAKE 3: Junimoji \"Dead Lift\""
date: 2021-02-09T20:54:00.004Z
---

I've recently come across a very interesting style of word puzzle, the Junimoji. Naturally I have decided to write one myself; it can be found <a href="https://github.andrewt.net/junimoji/?">here</a>. The rules are explained in full on the site. Have fun!
